name: 史蒂夫·塞勒-玛丽
name_full: 史蒂夫·塞勒-玛丽 Stevie Sailor-Marie
introduction: Stevie Sailor-Marie is a Swiss French-American actress and model. She is from the French part of Switzerland, (where she grew up on a farm,) has lived in New York, Las Vegas, and currently resides in Los Angeles and Switzerland. She speaks French and English. She got signed to her first acting agency at the age of 5. She has been in music videos for Khalid, Don Felder of The Eagles, and others. She has worked on TV shows such as Westworld and has experience in short films and commercials as well. At the age of 4, Stevie started ballet, tap and hip hop. In later years Stevie picked up pole dancing as well. Stevie can play a wide range of characters. She especially thrives in serious, dramatic roles. She studied improv at a young age and is very adaptable. Stevie has studied at Second City and The Ivana Chubbuck studio, as well as various other institutes.
